main_definition: The bikini is a two-piece swimsuit typically worn by women, often made of nylon or other lightweight materials.

meanings_and_examples.example: She wore a bright pink bikini at the resort.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiom meaning an uncomfortable or embarrassing situation
meanings_and_examples.example: He felt like he was in his own personal 'bikini' when asked to speak publicly without any preparation.
